title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Constructivist-Based Technology Integration Professional Development (TPDI) Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the TPDI framework based on constructivist design principles and explain at least three core elements
Learners can design technology integration strategies suitable for real educational scenarios and derive improvements through peer evaluation
Learners can demonstrate feasibility by proposing at least two effective ways to utilize technology tools in blended learning environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
